Class AbstractAMIDictTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.ami.tools.AbstractAMIDictTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DictionaryCreationTool, DictionaryDisplayTool, DictionarySearchTool, DictionaryTranslateTool, DictionaryUpdateTool

    public abstract class AbstractAMIDictTool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    mainly to manage help and parse dictionaries.
    Author:
    pm286
